section.name: Install and run the demo project
section.p: A demo project is also available:

ol.li: Check out the demo source code form the SVN repository: http://forge.onehippo.org/svn/embargo/embargo-demo/
Install the demo project with Maven.
Run the CMS module (mvn jetty:run-war) and browse http://localhost:8080/.
Run the site module (mvn jetty:run) and browse http://localhost:8085/site/preview/.
